1.title: the first choice

11.content: wow you are telekenetik you can move and/or mold objects with your mind but what gender are you?
11.title: telekenesis

111.content: You have an age right?
111.title: how old are you

1111.content: You are sixteen, the government is after you, and you didn't do anything wrong. well actualy you did one thing wrong, you were born. see the government took you at birth as part of an experiment, over the years the government has given you certain chemicals which gave you an amazing gift. you don't see it as a gift though, you see it as a curse. This is because when you were given these powers you were forbidden from the outside, but you rebeld, you escaped. You are now an outlaw from the government, they have posted a reward for your capture, but thankfully you can change your appearance as a result of your ability. you may be powerful but you have your limits, so you flee every time you are revealed. You have been moving a lot lately but where are you now?

choices: she stops and turns giving you the benefit of the doubt, she doesn't know you
she keeps running, no way in hell she is stopping for a freak like you
11111.content: You have ended up in new york, busy, hectic, and big; new york is definitely a good place to hide. It will be almost impossible for them to find you, how could they, you haven't used your powers for three years, since last they found you. It has become difficult for you to remember your actual appearance, you haven't seen your real face since you escaped, and sadly you probably never will again. Luckily you were able to find a job and a place to stay, but at minimum wage it's hard to keep it; not many people ask questions about why a 16 year old kid has an appartment, but you figure it's because it's new york, and there have been weirder things. You have made yourself to look like a 16 year old tom cruise, and it seems to be getting a lot of attention from girls. Anyways, you were walking home one night when a man tried to sneak up behind you to kill you and steel from you- and this is where you made your mistake- in the heat of the moment you used your powers to end it, knocking the man back 30 feet into a wall. When you turned a women was standing around the corner peaking at you, when you looked at her she turned and ran, "wait stop, please I won't hurt you!" you yell, what does she do?
11111.title: New York

12.content: oh god you can control fire, what gender are you?
12.title: pyrokenesis

122.content:
Groaning, you shift uncomfortably on the ground where you made your makeshift bed the night before. After a few more minutes, you finally come to terms with the fact that you won't be getting any more sleep. You stand, brushing dirt and other things you choose to ignore off your clothes. With no immediate tasks pressing you, you decide to take a little walk to warm yourself up, and to help you figure out exactly where you are. Your reflection in a broken mirror, carelessly discarded on the ground, catches your attention and draws you over to it.


How tall are you?
122.title: girl

13.content: You have the power to read and/or control other peoples minds but what gender are you?
13.title: telepathy

14.content: you can see every possible outcome of any situation, what gender are you?
14.title: psychic

info.brief_description: you are special, and the governments after you, how will you escape?
info.description:
you are a government experiment who has escaped. the government is desperate to get you back, but you aren't going back (willingly). You are an experiment that can use the powers of the mind such as : telekenesis, pyrokenesis, telepathy, remote viewing etc...

anything can be added, as long as it's not incoherent, or completely idiotic. Humour is fine, but this is not a comedy, and try not to end the story abrubtly, or in a moronic way such as " He got shot by a gun and died, lotsa blood everywere" and yes I did mean "everywere". anything other than that is fine though, so have fun and other... stuff.
